### Software
1. [Genetic Algorithm IAST:](http://salrodgom.github.io/gaiast/) we use Ideal Adsorbed Solution Theory (IAST) to predict the loading of the gas mixture on the bundle, based only on the knowledge of the pure adsorption isotherms of the individual components
2. [MC/EM/MD method for flexible zeolites with cations:](https://github.com/salrodgom/mcmd_gulp)
3. [White Rabbit:](https://github.com/salrodgom/white_rabbit)
